short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension replaces the words Trump with the word Poop, Spicer with Scphincter and Conway with ConJob

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trump to Poop: This extension will Replace the word Trump with the word Poop on most website also replaces Spicer with Scphincter! and Conway with ConJob!  Its the Poop Scphincter ConJob you never new you always wanted! 

President Poop thinks this is "really really Great! probably the Best Extension Ever made - I mean how could it not be great it's got Poop all over it and i should know because I'm "like" a smart person" 
President Poop says install Trump to Poop Scphincter ConJob now !
